channel.title: Off Field
channel.description: The daily podcast for everyone running sport off the field. From local club committees to state and national bodies, Off Field covers the news, trends, and ideas shaping sports administration across Australia. Governance, funding, volunteer management, digital transformation, and the business of keeping sport running -- two hosts break it down in fifteen minutes every weekday morning. Brought to you by TidyHQ and TidyConnect.
channel.itunes:author: TidyHQ
channel.itunes:summary: Your daily briefing on sports administration, club management, and community organisation news. Two hosts break down the stories that matter for anyone running a club, association, or community group in Australia.

item.title: NRL's Record Growth, AIS Youth Guidelines, and What Smart Governance Looks Like
item.description:
Off Field - Australian Sports Administration - The Daily Episode: NRL's Record Growth, AIS Youth Guidelines, and What Smart Governance Looks Like Date: 2026-02-24
Sponsored by TidyHQ (https://tidyhq.com) and TidyConnect (https://tidyconnect.com)
--- CHAPTERS ---
00:00 - Welcome to Off Field Link: https://tidyhq.com 00:30 - NRL Reports Record-Breaking Participation Link: https://www.nrl.com/news/2026/02/23/rugby-league-announces-record-breaking-results/ 04:00 - Schools Strategy: 829,000 Kids Through the Pipeline Link: https://www.nrl.com/news/2026/02/23/participation-growth-strengthens-foundation-for-future-success/ 07:00 - AIS Elite Youth Athlete Guidelines for Brisbane 2032 Link: https://www.ausport.gov.au/ais/eyaguidelines 10:00 - TidyConnect Sponsor Read Link: https://tidyconnect.com 10:30 - The Governance Lesson: What NRL's Growth Tells Us 14:00 - Quick Hits: Matildas, F1 Festival, Rally Broadcast Deal 17:00 - Sports Governance Recruitment Roundup Link: https://www.sportspeople.com.au 18:20 - Wrap Up Link: https://tidyhq.com
--- LINKS & SOURCES ---
- NRL Annual Report 2025 - Record Breaking Results https://www.nrl.com/news/2026/02/23/rugby-league-announces-record-breaking-results/ - NRL Participation Growth in Schools https://www.nrl.com/news/2026/02/23/participation-growth-strengthens-foundation-for-future-success/ - AIS Elite Youth Athlete Guidelines https://www.ausport.gov.au/ais/eyaguidelines - Matildas: Kerr and Fowler Boost Before Asian Cup https://www.abc.net.au/news/2026-02-23/sam-kerr-mary-fowler-matildas-asian-cup-boost/106374902 - Free F1 Fan Festival at Federation Square https://www.premier.vic.gov.au/free-f1-fan-festival-take-over-federation-square - Australian Rally Championship - New FOX SPORTS Deal https://motorsport.org.au/media/news/detail/2026/02/23/australian-rally-championship-secures-new-broadcast-deal/ - Karrie Webb Junior Female Golf Camp https://golf.com.au/news/karrie-webb-launches-junior-female-camp - Clearinghouse for Sport - Daily Sports News https://www.clearinghouseforsport.gov.au/ - TidyHQ - Club & Association Management https://tidyhq.com - TidyConnect - Communication Hub https://tidyconnect.com
--- ABOUT ---
Off Field is the daily podcast for everyone running sport off the field. From local club committees to state and national bodies, we cover the news, trends, and ideas shaping sports administration across Australia.
TidyHQ - All-in-one club management: https://tidyhq.com TidyConnect - Communication hub: https://tidyconnect.com
item.content:encoded:
NRL's Record Growth, AIS Youth Guidelines, and What Smart Governance Looks Like

The NRL reports record participation of 1.12 million, the AIS releases landmark youth athlete guidelines ahead of Brisbane 2032, and we break down what strategic sports administration looks like in practice. Plus quick hits on the Matildas, F1 Fan Festival, and sports governance recruitment.

In This Episode

  • 00:00 Welcome to Off Field — Read more
  • 00:30 NRL Reports Record-Breaking Participation — NRL Annual Report 2025
  • 04:00 Schools Strategy: 829,000 Kids Through the Pipeline — NRL Participation Growth
  • 07:00 AIS Elite Youth Athlete Guidelines for Brisbane 2032 — AIS Youth Athlete Guidelines
  • 10:00 TidyConnect Sponsor Read — Read more
  • 10:30 The Governance Lesson: What NRL's Growth Tells Us
  • 14:00 Quick Hits: Matildas, F1 Festival, Rally Broadcast Deal
  • 17:00 Sports Governance Recruitment Roundup — Sports recruitment on Sportspeople
  • 18:20 Wrap Up — Read more

Links & Sources

  • NRL Annual Report 2025 - Record Breaking Results
  • NRL Participation Growth in Schools
  • AIS Elite Youth Athlete Guidelines
  • Matildas: Kerr and Fowler Boost Before Asian Cup
  • Free F1 Fan Festival at Federation Square
  • Australian Rally Championship - New FOX SPORTS Deal
  • Karrie Webb Junior Female Golf Camp
  • Clearinghouse for Sport - Daily Sports News
  • TidyHQ - Club & Association Management
  • TidyConnect - Communication Hub

Sponsored by TidyHQ and TidyConnect
item.itunes:summary: The NRL reports record participation of 1.12 million, the AIS releases landmark youth athlete guidelines ahead of Brisbane 2032, and we break down what strategic sports administration looks like in practice. Plus quick hits on the Matildas, F1 Fan Festival, and sports governance recruitment.
item.itunes:keywords: sports administration, club management, governance, volunteer, Australia, community sport, association management
